DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand consume healthy cooky every day two week affect different type fat blood . Specifically , overall goal study find healthy cooky increase polyunsaturated fat call linoleic acid plasma , red blood cell white blood cell .
DOC.brief_title: The Healthy Cookie Study : Understanding How Healthy Cookies Affect Fat Blood ,
DOC.detailed_description: Overall , linoleic acid many health benefit include alter body composition energy metabolism , possibly impact cardiolipin . It therefore imperative develop food product allow Americans easily increase intake linoleic acid . It 's also important understand mechanism linoleic acid exert positive health effect , particularly state muscle mass quality loss associate mitochondria dysfunction . The investigator plan test central hypothesis accomplish overall objective research pursue follow three specific aim Aim 1 : To determine extent cooky , make grapeseed oil , increase linoleic acid plasma , red blood cell ( RBCs ) , peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMCs ) fraction blood two week consumption Aim 2 : To determine extent cooky , make grapeseed oil , increase cardiolipin linoleic acid content cardiolipin PBMCs two week consumption Aim 3 : To determine compare acceptability consume cooky make grapeseed oil high oleic safflower oil every day two week
DOC.criteria: Nonsmokers Current previous diagnosis diabetes , heart ( include stroke heart attack ) , kidney , liver circulatory disease and/or current treatment cancer . Gastrointestinal diseases disorder ( include pancreatic ) gastric bypass surgery Food Allergy Intolerance & Bee allergy Any dietary restriction consumption healthy cooky ingredient would contraindicate Use medication consume healthy cooky would contraindicate Use supplements/oils high linoleic acid past 4 week prior enrol Pregnancy
